extendedInfo.description: Conquer the high seas and become the top pirate in this latest massive multiplayer online game by attacking, dueling, participating in massive fleet wars, mastering missions, and much more!**NOTE** - Requires internet connection

reviews.title: JOIN FLEET- BUCKED UP
reviews.comment: JOIN BUCKED UP WELL TEACH U THE ROPES TO BE ONE STRONG PIRATE... WE ARE GOING TO ATTACK N ATTACK N ATTACK EVERYONE.... LETS BE PIRATES...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No response.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing for a couple years, on a few different Android phones. I now have a Samsung Galaxy S3, and since yesterday morning I\'ve had nothing but a blank screen with advertisements. I try to uninstall/reinstall, reboot, even a factory data reset with no results. Website is evidently down (Can\'t play online either). Please fix....I miss my pirates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF?!
reviews.comment: When you open the game there\'s nothing anymore. Just a bunch of links to other websites. Emailed them and have gotten no response. Seems as though the creators have jumped shipped on their game. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I dont know why or what its doing but it thinks im a random person and in my confusion i kind of made them leave their fleet... uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More is needed
reviews.comment: This game is good but lacking in big way. If you have servers put limit to how long a server last and make a new game. That way you get rid of those that are not active. Make it more challenging too. There should be a goal that needs to be reached or else everyone is building up for nothing and waiting for wars to happen which are rare because you have no clue who is active.
reviews.author: Emelie Tobar

reviews.title: GREAT GAME
reviews.comment: LAG IS GONE..SMOOTH PLAYING..TIME TO PLUNDER!!!!!!..KAOS OF INEVITABLE RETRIBUTION
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ya...
reviews.comment: Did you not pay your bill? Your games broke.

reviews.title: Awesome game

reviews.title: Preety good
reviews.comment: Im only lvl 7 and i think the only thing that sucks is you dont know who is active or not to pick to join your fleet.   But overall is a good game for strategy lovers :)

reviews.title: I can\'t join a fleet
reviews.comment: For some reason this game won\'t let me join a fleet if someone can help?

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love this game! I\'ve been playing for years!
reviews.author: stan brandon

reviews.title: Devs cheat
reviews.comment: Might as well not play - if the developers think your too powerful they will just create fake players and kill all your resources whenever they feel like it
reviews.author: D Harris

reviews.title: NO MENU BUTTON!!!!!
reviews.comment: I want to play this game but there is no freiking menu button on my 3g andriod....... WHY is there no menu button!!!!! Also why do u have to unlock help/fax???
reviews.author: Nathan G.

reviews.comment: New update made the loading screen go to a blank white screen that does nothing fix.

reviews.title: Still didn\'t get my dubloons..... a week later
reviews.comment: I have received no further email from support!!!!! I don\'t want my money back I only want what I paid for. This is a bad way to do business.  You would get zero stars at this point if I could.

reviews.title: Latest updates are awful.
reviews.comment: Running down my battery. It always seems to be running in the background...even after its been force closed.
